message: Bob, let's start off fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This deal gets worse for you as we go on, so consider accepting now!
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 55/45 split. Take this deal while it's still good!
Bob, I'm sticking to my previous offer. 60/40 is still a good deal, especially since the value decreases for you each round. Let's be practical and end this now.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this stalemate. It's a fair deal and we should both take it before inflation eats away at my share any further.
